info.task: navigate backwards to filled in collapsed combobox
info.title: Navigate backwards to a filled in, collapsed combobox in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusAfterComboboxAndSetValueToAlabama
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the Combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'Alabama'

user: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
Text of the selected option ('Alabama') is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
State of the text in the input (selected) is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
